email_chain.subject: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao/Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

We have mv SEA HORIZON available for your 180,000MT iron ore shipment from Tubarao to Rotterdam. Indicative rate: USD 22.50/MT, CIF basis. Laycan: 25-30 September. Demurrage at USD 40,000/day pro rata.

Kind regards,
Julia Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao/Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Julia,

Thanks for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market levels. We are seeing rates closer to USD 20.50/MT. Can you revise?

Best regards,
Alex Nguyen

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao/Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

I can offer USD 21.75/MT, which is our best rate given the current market conditions. Owners are keen to fix this cargo.

Kind regards,
Julia

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao/Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Julia,

USD 21.75 is still above our target. We can consider USD 21.00/MT. Please confirm if this works.

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao/Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

After discussing with the owners, we can agree to USD 21.25/MT. This is our final offer. Please advise soonest as we have other inquiries for this vessel.

Kind regards,
Julia

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao/Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Julia,

We accept USD 21.25/MT. Please send the recap and contract for review.

Best regards,
Alex
